con:request.name: Reporter: Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.is.ifmo.ru/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:create> <connection> <system>test</system> <token>16033000293945425444413946705324</token> </connection> <project>INBOX</project> <kind>RESEARCH</kind> <summary>SoapUI Issue</summary> <description>This issue was created by SoapUI via WebService</description> </ws:create> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Reporter: Edit
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.is.ifmo.ru/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:transitIssue> <connection> <system>test</system> <token>16033000293945425444413946705324</token> </connection> <idt>INBOX-17</idt> <transition>INBOX_REVIEW_REVIEW</transition> <summary/> <assignee/> <kind>INFO</kind> <description>This issue was created by SoapUI via WebService (and edited later on)</description> <resolution/> <comment>My edit</comment> </ws:transitIssue> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Reporter: Add comment
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.is.ifmo.ru/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:addIssueComment> <connection> <system>test</system> <token>16033000293945425444413946705324</token> </connection> <idt>INBOX-17</idt> <comment>I have edited this issue, please verify</comment> </ws:addIssueComment> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
